sentences:
Sentence 0:
We have shown that ethanol, propanol and butanol (at 0.5-2%) and salts of butyric and propionic acids (at 8-40 mM) all cause a major reduction in heat-shock protein (hsp) synthesis when present in the growth medium of Drosophila cultured cells (Kc and SL2) subjected to either increased temperature or chemical stressors.
sentence_raw: We have shown that ethanol, propanol and butanol (at 0.5-2%) and salts of butyric and propionic acids (at 8-40 mM) all cause a major reduction in heat-shock protein (hsp) synthesis when present in the growth medium of Drosophila cultured cells (Kc and SL2) subjected to either increased temperature or chemical stressors.
